description: The [b]Image to Clipboard[/b] plugin enables users to [b]copy images to the clipboard[/b] using either an [b]Element ID[/b] or a [b]direct Image URL[/b]. Since the [b]Clipboard API only supports PNG[/b], all copied images are [b]automatically converted to PNG[/b], regardless of their original format (JPG, JPEG, GIF, WEBP, etc.). For [b]SVG support[/b], the plugin includes a [b]dedicated SVG Clipboard element[/b], which provides separate [b]copy and paste[/b] actions specifically for SVG images. âœ¨ [b]Key Features[/b] ğŸ“‹ [b]Copy Images via Element ID[/b] â€“ Select and copy images from any element containing an tag. ğŸ”— [b]Copy Images via URL[/b] â€“ Fetch and copy images directly from a provided URL. ğŸ”„ [b]Automatic PNG Conversion[/b] â€“ Due to Clipboard API limitations, all copied images are converted to PNG. âŒ [b]SVG Not Supported in Standard Actions[/b] â€“ Use the [b]SVG Clipboard element[/b] for dedicated SVG copy & paste functionality. ğŸ–¼ï¸ [b]Supports Multiple Formats[/b] â€“ Works with JPG, JPEG, GIF, WEBP before converting to PNG. ğŸ¨ [b]SVG Clipboard Element[/b] â€“ Allows [b]copy & paste actions[/b] exclusively for SVG images. ğŸš€ [b]Optimized for Performance[/b] â€“ Fast processing with smooth clipboard operations. ğŸ”—Demo Link: https://chakor-plugin-demo-7.bubbleapps.io/version-test/image_to_clipboard ğŸ”—Editor Link: https://bubble.io/page?id=chakor-plugin-demo-7&test_plugin=1741339576263x625726221942521900_current&tab=Design&name=image_to_clipboard&type=page Our team is available to solve any problems or questions you may have, please open a thread on our support forum: https://forum.thechakor.com/t/plugin-issues
